Text:
If this goes over well with the comments and reviews, and you guys like what i have done, I will continue.  It took a long while to scan and crop each page then convert to PDF making it look like a store bought EBook.  But I am willing to do it a lot more if it is liked, and i should be able to have the black ops 2 one up a couple days after release in November.  And willing to take requests for other game guides.
Thank You
Thanks for all of the hard work!!!!!
Thanks for all your hard work, I know that wasn't easy to do, but we do appreciate it. Thanks again!
Got some good news for some of you also, I am in the process of doing Ghost Recon Future Soldier, so that will be up in a couple days!
